title: Gelish Foundation and Top Coat "Set of 2" Ship Now
description: This wonderful set of Base and Top Coat gel provides the basics for any style of manicure or pedicure.Gelish Foundation Base Gel creates the adhesive bond between the nail plate and gel products. This product secures adhesion while not damaging the natural nail plate. Foundation will work with Hand & Nail Harmony Gelish products as a base for Soak Off Gel Polish. Gelish Foudation cures in 10 seconds in a LED Light or 30 seconds in an UV Light.Gelish Top It Off Gel is a sealer top gel designed to create the ultimate finish with your Gelish Soak Off Polish. It creates a high shine that will not dull, chip or peel. Top It Off is a soak off product that can quickly be removed with Soak Off Gel Remover. This coat cures in 30 seconds in a LED Light or 2 minutes in a UV Light.

title: Ibd Just Gel Polish "Smokey Plum #56505" New Color
description: IBD introduces just gel, the strong 100% pure gel formula that wears like a classic true gel. Apply it just like polish and be rewarded with richer, more even color. This versatile gel polish cures quickly under either LED or UV light. It also protects natural nails with stronger, long-lasting wear. Gel removal is simple as well. Remove Just Gel Polish easily in just 10 minutes with no mess and no fuss.Instructions:File and shape nailRemove and push back cuticleBuff nail to remove shine and dustApply foundation and cure 1 minuteApply thin coat of color to nails and cure for 2 minutesApply second coat of color and cure for 2 minutesApply top coat and cure for 2 minutesCleanse nail to ensure mirror finish

title: Salon Edge 36W Nail UV Lamp Acrylic Gel Shellac Curing Light Timer 36 Watt Dryer With Slide Out Tray
description: Salon Edge Branded 36 Watt Professional UV Curing Lamp for Fast Acrylic Gel DryingExcellent professional quality for the shop and light enough to take along with you. This unit uses 4 powerful UV bulbs and features a built in timer. Enjoy your FREE sanding file!Effectively and quickly cured all UV and gel based products.Reflective inside lining to ensure proper uniform drying.Fast curing of UV gels one hand at a time.Built in timer with 2 minute setting for perfect time management.Includes easy access panel on bottom to easily change bulbs.Simple fuse replacement compartment with single turn access.Features Salon Edge logo to ensure you recieve the quality you deserve.

title: BrightTherapy Trident SR11A Light Therapy System Red Blue Green LED Light for Acne Wrinkles and Hyperpigmentation
description:
The BrightThreapy Trident SR11A-R gives you 3 LED Light Therapy treatments in 1! The hand held LED Cluster employs SUPER BRIGHT High Power LED Light Therapy treatments in a non-invasive, non-thermal, single frequency light energy. The BT-SR11A-R offers 4 different LED color frequencies. Featuring 3 detachable LED Cluster heads! 
*With the RED & INFRARED treatment head the BT-SR11A works great for reducing wrinkles; tighten skin, giving a more beautiful radiant and youthful complexion with the RED and Infrared cluster. 
*Using the BLUE LED treatment head you can reduce acne and heals acne faster as blue 420nm light kill the bacteria that causes acne. 
*The GREEN LED treatment head helps to reduces age spots lightens freckles, and hyper pigmentation. It is the ultimate non-chemical, all natural approach beautiful skin.

The Trident's High Power High Output LEDs are rated at over 10,000 hours of continuous use. They will never burnout or need to be replaced.  The Trident's mono-chromatic light is tuned to preciously to give the maximum benefit and effectiveness.  Safe, fast, affordable and non-invasive the BrightTherapy Trident SR11a Light therapy wand is the most versatile method for treating various dermatological conditions. Note: Some users see an increase in acne from 1-3 weeks after initial use but this is normal as Blue Light Therapy pulls the bacteria from under the skin and releases it. Please continue using the Blue Light Therapy device and within a few weeks you should see considerable improvements as the bacteria dies out.

Included are the:
*LED hand held base.
*Red & Infrared SUPPER BRIGHT LED treatment head (660nm Red & 880nm Infrared)
*Blue SUPPER BRIGHT LED Treatment Head (415nm Blue)
*Green SUPPER BRIGHT LED Treatment Head (525nm Green)
*110-240v AC Adapter which works worldwide. (USA style plug shape)
* Cordless
*Instruction booklet in English
*1 year warranty 

-Programmable pulsing (5Htz)
-Buit in 10 minute timer with auto shutoff.
